2164.subject: CST
2164.descrlong:
Introduces page layout design for print and screen. Students work in Adobe InDesign and Adobe Acrobat. Emphasizes use of type, typesetting techniques, legibility, and design composition. Covers scanning, importing files, and mastering digital prepress production. Includes course related field trips.  (Credit/ No Credit Available)

(Prereq: CST 227)
